name: Vulcan Technologies
long_description:
Vulcan primarily offers two different AI services for two different constituencies:
1) Automatic regulatory drafting for executive branch agencies in government and 
2) Regulatory compliance and comment for industry
Beneath these tools is a proprietary system of vectorized embeddings that we call "intelligent legal cartography," an automatic mapping of relationships between statutes, regulations, and case law. In short: Vulcan equips agencies to comply with changing state and federal law, and enables business to comment, contest, and comply with regulatory requirements.
